definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Would you please send per return of post all the information you can get respecting Messrs. Ishii & Co. ?
sentences.chinese: 恳请尽量提早告知有关石井公司的各项情报。

sentences.english: Duidu Dock from Dabai Island to Shijing that appropriate by the Ministry of Communications has been constructed.
sentences.chinese: 由交通部拨款建设的大佰岛至石井的对渡码头已建成。

sentences.english: In Fukuoka, I met Mr Isii.
sentences.chinese: 在福冈，我见到了一位石井先生。

sentences.english: Stone well will drive into the bamboo organ, Qian Baihao opportunity from behind the car.
sentences.chinese: 石井将车开入竹机关，钱柏豪趁机从车后下去。

sentences.english: Ms Ishii says she saw a dog run off with a human bone.
sentences.chinese: 石井夫人说，她甚至看到狗叼着人骨头奔走。

sentences.english: Immunity from prosecution is extended to all members of Ishii's team.
sentences.chinese: 起诉豁免权延伸至所有成员石井的团队。
